articles.description: Ikea, the Sweden-based global furniture retailer known for its frugal and efficient products, is likely to open its third mega store in India in Bangalore around April. IKEA's India CEO Peter Bezel said the company is on track to open its first store in Banga…
articles.content:
Ikea, the Sweden-based global furniture retailer known for its frugal and efficient products, is likely to open its third mega store in India in Bangalore around April.

articles.title: This textiles company stock has zoomed 291% in 6 weeks since split - Business Standard
articles.description: In past six months, the stock of Raghuvir Synthetics has zoomed 2623 per cent as against a 12.6 per cent gain in the S&P BSE Sensex
articles.content: Shares of Raghuvir Synthetics were locked at the upper circuit for the 29th straight trading day, up 5 per cent at Rs 571.85 on the BSE on Thursday. Since October 28, 2021, in the past six weeks, the… [+4232 chars]

articles.author: Livemint
articles.title: How many SIM cards do you have? Govt makes big decision on keeping multiple SIMs - Mint
articles.description: The Central government has issued an order to disconnect the phone connections of people with more than nine SIM cards.The DoT has asked telecom operators to remove all the flagged mobile connections from the database that are not in use
articles.content: The Central government has issued an order to disconnect the phone connections of people with more than nine sim cards. As per the latest order by the department of Telecommunication (DoT), the offic… [+1946 chars]

articles.author: TNN
articles.title: Meta opens first standalone Asia office in Gurugram, with a digital skilling hub - Times of India
articles.description: Meta, the newly formed parent company of Facebook, on Wednesday unveiled its new office in the city, spanning 130,000 sqft with a digital skilling hub
